name: Moon Racer
description:
You are playing as Pen, a friendly alien trying to drive across the moon. Pen is driving his beautiful UFO that uses 'Space' as fuel. But there is only one problem! Pen has a leak in his gas tank 'Space container', so he keeps running out of gas SPACE!

Controls A/D - Driving left and right (While on the moon) A/D - Balancing yourself in the air (While in the air) Space - Handbrake

Links Game: https://lukewaffel.itch.io/moon-racer Source: https://gitlab.com/LukeWaffel/LD42-Moon_Racer.git

Credits Art: Ilse Wensink (Discord: Ilsaaah#6872) Programming: Luuk ‘LukeWaffel’ Domhof (Discord: LukeWaffel#0835 | Twitter: https://twitter.com/LukeWaffel | Google:  lukewaffel@gmail.com)
